text: Kare koso wa, jihi ni sakinjite kippō o motarasu kaze o okura reru okatadearu. Sore ga (ame o) fukunda omoi kumo o un beba, ware wa sore o shinde iru ji ni okutte ame o furase, kore ni yotte kakushu no kajitsu o seisan sa seru. Ware wa kono yō ni shisha o yomigaera seru. Osoraku anata gata wa satorudearou
